pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Smoothing of the Hazard Function // The function estimates the hazard function non parametrically from a survival object (possibly adjusted for covariates). The smoothed estimate is based on B-splines from the perspective of generalized linear mixed models. Left truncated and right censoring data are allowed. The package is based on the work in Rebora P (2014) doi:10.32614/RJ-2014-028.
